text: Pippa Passes is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithPippa Passes; or, The Song of ConscienceCharles Keil. A Companion to D. W. Griffith and stars Gertrude Robinson, George Nichols, and Arthur V. Johnson. The movie is based on a play Pippa Passes by Robert Browning. ==Actors== *Gertrude Robinson - Pippa *George Nichols - Pippa's Husband *Arthur V. Johnson - Luca *Marion Leonard - Ottima *Owen Moore - Sibald *Linda Arvidson - Greek Model *Clara T. Bracy *Adele DeGarde *James Kirkwood - In Bar ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Pippa Passes (movie)
